Sentencas: A segmented-in series (SIS) SOFC consists of segmented unit cells connected in electrical series and shows improved stack efficiency over conventional SOFCs.
Titulo: Design of a dual-layer ceramic interconnect based on perovskite oxides for segmented-in-series solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this design, a thin interconnect film provides both electrical contact and sealing between the anode of one cell and the cathode of the next; thus, it should have high conductivity and chemical/structural stability in both reducing and oxidizing atmospheres as well as impermeability to gases.
Titulo: Design of a dual-layer ceramic interconnect based on perovskite oxides for segmented-in-series solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Here, we report a dual-layer interconnect film for SIS -SOFCs comprising perovskite-type oxides, Sr0.7La0.2TiO3 (exposed to a reducing atmosphere) and La0.8Sr0.2FeO3 (exposed to an oxidizing atmosphere).
Titulo: Design of a dual-layer ceramic interconnect based on perovskite oxides for segmented-in-series solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The interconnect film is not only very dense but also highly conductive and stable under SOFC operating conditions; in particular, it shows an area-specific resistance of 19.6 m Omega cm(2) at 800 similar to degrees C, which is much lower than the generally accepted limit for SOFCs.
Titulo: Design of a dual-layer ceramic interconnect based on perovskite oxides for segmented-in-series solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A flat-tubular SIS-SOFC fabricated using these interconnect films exhibits a power density as high as 340 mW cm(-2), which proves the feasibility of the dual-layer interconnect design.
Titulo: Design of a dual-layer ceramic interconnect based on perovskite oxides for segmented-in-series solid oxide fuel cells
Design of a dual-layer ceramic interconnect based on perovskite oxides for segmented-in-series solid oxide fuel cells
Design of a dual-layer ceramic interconnect based on perovskite oxides for segmented-in-series solid oxide fuel cells
